translation: "unbelievable! why are there still companies that collect and misuse our personal data? #dataprivacy #privatesphere #security"

this post critically examines the topic of protecting personal information regarding data privacy. it expresses surprise and frustration towards companies that still collect and misuse personal data, highlighting the importance of data privacy, private sphere, and security. the hashtags used help to reach a wider audience and encourage discussion on the topic.
